price: 12. Tokkel Ni-gibdi digaalá sinnil oobah yablen waqdi, usun too waqdi teetik kudeenih teetik yassaqqoonuwaanam akkaluk.
arabic: فَلَمَّآ أَحَسُّواْ بَأۡسَنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنۡهَا يَرۡكُضُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: falammā aḥassū basanā idhā hum min'hā yarkuḍūna
